sentences.english: To summarize the effects of rehabilitation nursing for 112 stroke patients with dysphagia.
sentences.chinese: 總結了112例腦卒中患者吞嚥障礙的康復護理體會。

sentences.english: Patients with epilepsy or bipolar disorder can have difficulty swallowing tablets.
sentences.chinese: 癲癇病人或雙相性精神障礙病人對吞嚥藥物有困難。

sentences.english: My swallowing reflex was destroyed, I couldn't even drink.
sentences.chinese: 吞嚥反射被破壞，我甚至無法飲水。

sentences.english: Cracks will occur in the region of the thyroid cartilage because of deglutition.
sentences.chinese: 甲狀軟骨部分會由於吞嚥動作而龜裂。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the availability of inserting stomach tube as swallowing warm water.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討在吞嚥溫水的同時置入胃管的有效性。

sentences.english: Chew your food well before you swallow it.
sentences.chinese: 食物在吞嚥前要仔細咀嚼。

sentences.english: Baby Orajel Tooth & Gum Cleanser also does not foam and does not contain abrasives.
sentences.chinese: 無氟配方，安全可吞嚥，並且不含泡沫及研磨劑。

sentences.english: I gulped it down, blood, saliva and all.
sentences.chinese: 我一口全吞嚥下去了，分不清是血還是唾液。

sentences.english: Don't chew the tablets before swallowing, or you may throw them up.
sentences.chinese: 不要把藥片嚼碎再吞嚥，否則你會吐出來的。

sentences.english: This all-natural, organic glide-coat is designed to make swallowing your vitamins effortless.
sentences.chinese: 這種全天然，有機滑行外套是爲了使吞嚥維他命輕鬆。

sentences.english: Do you wince at the thought of swallowing a tequila worm?
sentences.chinese: 吞嚥一杯蟲子蒸餾酒，這想法有沒有讓你不寒而慄？

sentences.english: After the stent placement, all patients could take solid food without dysphagia.
sentences.chinese: 支架置放期間所有患兒能進食固體食物，無吞嚥困難。

sentences.english: Small children sometimes choke or asphyxiate while trying to swallow big tablets.
sentences.chinese: 幼兒在試圖吞嚥大藥片時有時會噎住或窒息。

sentences.english: Some patients develop temporary difficulty swallowing immediately after the operation.
sentences.chinese: 一些病人在手術之後會有暫時的吞嚥困難。

sentences.english: Honey helps coat sore throats so that swallowing isn't so painful.
sentences.chinese: 蜂蜜有助於緩解喉嚨痛，減輕吞嚥的痛苦。

sentences.english: He sat by the fire, devouring beef and onions.
sentences.chinese: 坐火爐旁，狼吞嚥喫着牛肉蔥。

definition: diaphragm/also written 橫隔膜|横隔膜[heng2 ge2 mo2]
loose (soil, or limbs of a relaxed person etc)/flaky (pastry etc)
